title.rendered: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN ENTREPRENEUR ?

content.rendered:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UnXgqpl5JO4

Move over Big Brother and Jersey Shore! The Nerd’s are coming to town, hahaha. Jump to 2:48 to meet some of the nerds that work at A Nerd’s World.

What are your thoughts on a weekly or bi-weekly show documenting 1 full day at A Nerd’s World? I would introduce you to my team of talented nerds, and invite you to watch the day-to-day life of an entrepreneur in the world of website design.

Your comments and subscriptions could sway the vote. If I see interest, we will start filming and editing next week.

Let me know your thoughts below, and tell a friend.

 

Chris A. Hughes
